body: Was worried about that one page, lucky the main guy was able to turn Super Saiyan and KO the dude who was about to turn this Manga into an NTR

Interesting, another story that DOESN'T have scat, cheating or NTR (or worse gorn and snuff) from this artist! Guess he's gotten bored of doing the same thing so much to play a story straight like the vampire Gender Bender it did not too long ago! (The one with the Vampire Gyaru's and the Young Vampire Lord Simping so hard for his Tomgirl Childhood friend that he was just building up his power to turn said friend into a girl for real so they could be together as mates! Really funny subversion from his other stories LOL)
